transformations.name: map
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		UnitedKingdomProviderReferenceNumber as string,
		ProviderName as string,
		ProviderStatus as string,
		ProviderContact as (ContactType as string, ContactAddress as (SAON as (Description as string), PAON as (Description as string), StreetDescription as string, UniqueStreetReferenceNumber as string, Locality as string, Items as string[], ItemsElementName as string[], PostTown as string, PostCode as string, UniquePropertyReferenceNumber as string), ContactPersonalDetails as (PersonNameTitle as string, PersonGivenName as string, PersonFamilyName as string, PersonNameSuffix as string, PersonRequestedName as string), ContactRole as string, ContactTelephone1 as string, ContactTelephone2 as string, ContactFax as string, ContactWebsiteAddress as string, ContactEmail as string, LastUpdated as string)[],
		ProviderVerificationDate as string,
		ProviderVerificationDateSpecified as boolean,
		ExpiryDateSpecified as boolean,
		ProviderAssociations as string,
		ProviderAliases as (ProviderAlias as string, LastUpdated as string)[],
		VerificationDetails as (VerificationAuthority as string, VerificationID as string)[],
		DateUpdated as string,
		DateDownloaded as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'document') ~> providers
source(output(
		ProviderUkprn as string,
		CourseName as string,
		CourseId as string,
		LearnAimRef as string,
		DeliveryMode as string,
		StartDate as string,
		FlexibleStartDate as string,
		CourseURL as string,
		Cost as string,
		CostDescription as string,
		Regions as string,
		National as string,
		LocationName as string,
		LocationAddress1 as string,
		LocationAddress2 as string,
		LocationTown as string,
		LocationPostcode as string,
		LocationLatitude as string,
		LocationLongitude as string,
		UpdatedDate as string,
		DurationUnit as string,
		DurationValue as string,
		AttendanceType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> courses
map foldDown(unroll(ProviderContact),
	mapColumn(
		ProviderUkprn = UnitedKingdomProviderReferenceNumber,
		ProviderName = ProviderName,
		ContactType = ProviderContact.ContactType,
		ContactAddress = ProviderContact.ContactAddress,
		ContactPersonalDetails = ProviderContact.ContactPersonalDetails,
		ContactRole = ProviderContact.ContactRole,
		ContactTelephone1 = ProviderContact.ContactTelephone1,
		ContactTelephone2 = ProviderContact.ContactTelephone2,
		ContactFax = ProviderContact.ContactWebsiteAddress,
		ContactEmail = ProviderContact.ContactEmail
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flattenContactDetails
flattenContactDetails split(ContactType == "P",
	ContactType == "T",
	disjoint: false) ~> splitContactTypes@(ContactType = P, ContactType = T, )
providers, courses exists(UnitedKingdomProviderReferenceNumber == ProviderUkprn,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> selectRelevantProviders
selectRelevantProviders derive(Alias = toString(byName('Alias')),
		CourseDirectoryName = toString(byName('CourseDirectoryName')),
		DateOnboarded = toString(byName('DateOnboarded')),
		LastUpdatedBy = toString(byName('LastUpdatedBy')),
		MarketingInformation = toString(byName('MarketingInformation')),
		NationalApprenticeshipProvider = toBoolean(byName('NationalApprenticeshipProvider')),
		PassedOverallQAChecks = toBoolean(byName('PassedOverallQAChecks')),
		ProviderId = toInteger(byName('ProviderId')),
		ProviderType = toInteger(byName('ProviderType')),
		RoATPFFlag = toBoolean(byName('RoATPFFlag')),
		RoATPProviderTypeId = toInteger(byName('RoATPProviderTypeId')),
		RoATPStartDate = toString(byName('RoATPStartDate')),
		TradingName = toString(byName('TradingName')),
		UPIN = toInteger(byName('UPIN')),
		UpdatedBy = toString(byName('UpdatedBy'))) ~> map
